casebody.data:
Melissa CURTIS, Guardian of Mario Maupin, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
AUTO CLUB INSURANCE ASSOCIATION, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 157423
COA: 339843 Supreme Court of Michigan. September 12, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the February 7, 2018 order of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should now be reviewed by this Court.
